segments.advisor_message: So, uh, let’s chat about your goals today. What do you kinda want to achieve or, like, discuss in our session? Any, um, specific objectives on your mind?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah! I really want to, um, make sure I save enough for like retirement, right? And, um, I've also been thinking 'bout maybe investing in something a lil' more, um, risky, ya know?

segments.advisor_message: Got it! Retirement is super important, and a little risk can be, like, beneficial for growth. What sources or, um, info have you checked out about investments, if any?
segments.client_message: I’ve read some articles online, but they’re kinda all over the place! Some say stocks, others talk about, uh, mutual funds or whatever. It’s just a bit confusing, honestly!
